word_mean: 小岛，岛：细胞群或孤立的组织团。见island

sentence.Network_en: 'The anchorage is on the south, behind an islet, I fancy?'
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我想锚地大概是在南面那个小岛的后面 吧 ?”

sentence.Network_en: It completes its journey in the vast expanse of the Thousand - Islet Lake.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽头处,有浩瀚的“千岛湖”.

sentence.Network_en: You can find whole regiments of birds on the islet.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那个小岛上你可以看到成群的鸟.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French, diminutive of isle (see isle)

entry.def: An islet is a small island.

auth_sentence.content: Diabetologists had long regarded duct cells as mere chaff, to be removed from the islet tissue they were trying to transplant.
